content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    *
/* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') AS header1
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2') AS header2
*/
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://wggsynapselakegen2.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake-synapse/nyc_green_taxi_data/raw/rate_code.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsondoc varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id INT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    );
